name: Big Bad Wolf (MoJoE)
description:
A game made for Global Game Jam 2022. Jam theme was Duality. Werewolfs are known to be creatures that have both a human form and a monsterous form, inspiring gameplay that would have two different game modes (a day mode and a night mode). 

In the night mode you run around a village, killing villagers and taking their valuable possessions. In the day mode, time progresses in the span of weeks, and you must spend the money you have collected to increase your reach, unlock new villages, and invest in villages to earn a passive income.

Sadly I spent too much time on the night mode, and thus did not have time to complete the day mode, thus it is not included in the build, but a screenshot it include to show what it would look like.
